files.patch:
@@ -1,7 +0,0 @@
-Dir.glob('src/test/mir-opt/**/*.rs').each do |f|
-  puts f
-  t = File.read(f)
-  b = File.basename(f, ".rs")
-  t.gsub!(/\/\/ EMIT_MIR rustc/, "// EMIT_MIR " + b)
-  File.open(f, "w") { |f| f.puts t }
-end
